name: gita-data
description: This project follows section: *Summary of best option for generous free-tier Gita API implementation* in [this blog post](https://raviswdev.blogspot.com/2025/12/create-gita-json-file-rest-api-hosted.html) to create a static Bhagavad Gita JSON files API hosted on GitHub Pages. It is an in-progress project.
